БУНД!!!! ПОЧИНИТЕ ДБД!!!

НЕ ИГРАЙТЕ В ЭТОТ ШЛАК. Идея классная, реализация - полудер*мо. Эта игра взорвет ваш пукан к хАям. Комьюнити этой игры - дебилы: убийцы тоннелят, выжившие просто хуй кладут на команду. 

К данной игре ничто не может вызывает здоровый интерес, если вы не мазохист!  

Эта игра просто один дисбаланс: 

ХИТБОКСЫ. 
У убийц итак все преимущества по скорости и урону + доп. перки типа барбекю и чили и прочей уеты, но наладить хитбоксы и пинг создатели не могут.  Убийца режет дерево, бьет воздух, а падает выживший где то рядом (Ну игра так обсчитала, хуль).
Площадь урона у убийц вообще конусообразная, анимация удара вообще роли не играет, то есть не важно в начале анимации ман в тебя попадёт или когда уже почти опустил руку в спокойное состояние. Можно поставить на анимацию дрочку или что то еще более бессмысленное и это тоже не сыграет роли потому что пытаться ждать и уворачиваться во время анимации убийц смысла НЕТ! Он может ударить в одну сторону, затем сделать разворот на 180 и этот "урон конусом" который пройдет полукругом, попав в который ты в любом случае упадешь. Убийце можно в начале анимации удара прокрутиться на 360 во время удара и выживший находящийся рядом получит урон. 

ЗВУК
Оооо, это сказка. Звук тут распространяется с неебически тупым свойством. Убийца может включить самый тихий предмет ПИЛУ и звук при этом будет идти на весь лес, то есть где на данный момент конкретный источник находится вы не поймете НУНИКАК и убийца просто выходит у вас из за спины, когда по звуку он включил пилу на другом конце карты.

СИСТЕМА НАГРАЖДЕНИЯ.
Пример:
Игрок починил 1 генератор, повисел на крюке, сдох через 3 минуты со старта раунда - получил 7к очей

Мы с другом остались играть вдвоем, расхлебывать за двух этих же даунов умерших в начале игры, мансили всю игру так что убийца нас не видел и при этом завели 3 генератора. В итоге нас слил ман и мы всего-то получили по 9к. АУЕННО. 30 минут играли, скрывались, мансили как полубоги. Вопрос, ЗАЧЕМ?

ok

The concept is great. However, the game is riddled with bugs, some that the developers have refused to fix. Latency between killer and survivor is completely off at times, leading to killers actually getting impossible hits that did not even reach the survivor. Other than that and the many other issues that plague this game, is the Disconnects. Disconnects happen way more than they should, rather intentional or not. Survivors that DC could potentially ruin the game for their team. When killer DC's, Your not allowed the game play, and instead are taken to the main menu, and have all your respective offerings taken from you. This is one of the worst issues in the game, and could be easily fixed by issuing time outs or bans, per certain number of disconnects. 

This game has been out for well over three years at this point and some of these bugs are still present from release. This could all be fixed by the developers, but they either ignore it, or refuse to fix them. Although this game is in a very ruff spot, I still find myself continuously playing it because i'm addicted to it...

Still, I can not recommend this to anyone until they fix this garbage heap that they maintain.

I used to occasionally be pissed off at being hit my a killer, when I'm finished with the vault animation and already on the other side of the window/pallet.

Now I'm pissed off almost every match because killers can hit you while being NOWHERE near you. The usual tactics that were available to survivors to avoid being hit (temporarily, if any chase goes long enough, you'll get hit) have been completely dismantled.
Игра в целом хорошая. Отличная задумка, прикольная система прокачки персонажей. Единственный косяк, это частые багги в игре.

Honestly it was one of the most enjoyable games I played alone and with my friends but thanks to the freaking ping and the disconnections you get VERY often I don't have the sligthest will to play this game anymore really got me sick of it. I hope the producers of DBD are gonna fix the problem.. Me and my friends are sorry on the money we spent on this game.

June 2020 review update:

This is a game with an awesome concept and gameplay ideas.

It had many issues years ago with lobby problems if you wanted to play with your friends, no dedicated servers, many many bugs (some still happen). The grind was unbearable specially when Barbecue and Chili didn't show up in the Bloodweb.

Now, it's better. Your friends lobby doesn't go away after a match, there are dedicated servers (although they suck, and we still have issues with Huntress' hatchets, hits through windows, etc), and more perks show up in the Bloodweb after level 40.

The balancing still needs tweaks, most killers are still crap at high ranks, there are many useless or merely meme perks because BHVR don't buff them (I'm talking about you, No Mither). If they think gens go too fast and killers can't pressure enough, change the gameplay, add more objectives, etc.

The rank system still sucks but it's going to be replaced by an MMR system, which can help in building more balanced matches. Let's see how it goes.

A lot of connection bugs seem to be fixed now. They were a huge pain in the ass for quite some time, and it is good that BHVR devs managed to fix them after so long.

I have fun playing Dead by Daylight, and the game has a lot of potential for growth. BHVR is slowly improving players experience instead of only focusing on cosmetics and other products. Fixing the remaining bugs, improving the balancing of the game and fixing dedicated servers are the key to make DbD a great experience for everyone.

Oh, if you can buy this game with friends, it will make the game way better. But you'll enjoy playing it solo (although the Survivor life may be painful playing solo - I suggest playing a Head On build just for trolling killers to make your experience less painful).

此游戏值得入手，但收藏和真正游玩的话，请三思。
当然这是对于刚入手的萌新来说,此游戏对于萌新开始很不友好。
接下来就来说说开始入手的萌新游玩需要知道的：
一：救人环节：等杀手走后救人（注意：各个杀手有不同的技能，需要萌新去了解各个杀手），带时不我待最好。（特别注意：千万不要在杀手附近就救人，那样只会害队友再次被打倒上钩，一个人最多上钩3次后就会凉凉，第一次上钩可以自我挣脱，不过概率只有百分之4，一般不到特殊情况不要挣脱，等队友救。除非带善有善报（救了在钩子上的一名逃生者，给百分之百的成功挣脱率。重要的事情说3遍：不要在杀手附近救人，不要在杀手附近救人，不要在杀手附近救人！！！！
二：逃生者的技能都需要清楚，T1的技能：前期黑妹的自我疗愈，冲刺爆发（弹射）等。但最重要的是大卫·金的生死与共和杀手的人肉烧烤和厄咒（都是加血点的，前期都是使用此些技能起步加血点，对萌新来说：开始游玩的时候血点最难搞，如果你想一直玩下去就在血猎活动时游玩，何况现在3周年，血网中的恐怖蛋糕刷新率非常高（百分之103加成血点对所有玩家）（补：血点是游戏货币，血网是可供货币消费的地方，可学技能，获得道具，祭品和附加品的地方。道具有医疗包，工具箱，手电筒，钥匙，地图等。附加品就是道具的附加BUFF。祭品有许多；如；加血点的（像之前说的蛋糕等），送往各地图的，增加运气的等。
三：游戏里注意的东西，也跟技能有关吧。：1，杀手带了厄咒时，逃生者在破译发电机时，技能检验圈为红色，就需要4人逃生者寻找被点燃着的图腾，且杀手许多技能跟图腾有大关系，如：一刀倒。厄咒会减速破译。重要的事情再说3遍：需要先去了解熟悉杀手和逃生者技能！！需要先去了解熟悉杀手和逃生者技能！！需要先去了解熟悉杀手和逃生者技能！！特别是现在新杀手鬼面。
四：如果你想游玩杀手角色，你需要非常有耐心，因为等待时间很长，都是杀手先创房，等待逃生者进入且无法看见逃生者之间的打字栏，就是这个创建房间需要等待很久。（你需要非常有耐心，耐心和耐心）
五：一些游戏操作和附加品：r键是扔下道具或放下抱起的逃生者，shift跑步（逃生者适用，可shift加空格快速翻越和放板，不过会给杀手一个提示，逃生者互动动作检验失败以及发电机检验失败和对自身的检验失败都会给杀手提示，切记。附加品是要说红针：治疗时空格即可。
六：以上，祝大家购买后愉快游玩，能有游戏体验。另外也喜欢黎明杀机团队能越做越好，更新的越来越好，以及bug的减少。

Few years ago it was really interesting to play this game. It was a kind of innovative and its idea was a really new thing to the gaming undustry. It was still obviuos back then that there are many things that should be fixed/added and what do we have now? BEHAVIOUR are just keep adding junk to this pile. New updates and addons are more and more inane and useless, in fact they are just making the game worse. Those ugly new survivors (most of them) and preposterous killers. Add $hitty perks and now I (you) have reached the point when there is no satisfaction at all coming from this game.
